name: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
description: PCOS is a hormonal disorder that affects the ovaries, causing them to develop small cysts. It can lead to irregular menstrual cycles, excess hair growth, acne, and weight gain. PCOS may also impact fertility.

name: Depression and Anxiety
description: Mental health disorders like depression and anxiety are more common in women. They can affect mood, emotions, and daily functioning.

name: Osteoporosis
description: Osteoporosis is a bone disease that weakens bones and increases the risk of fractures. It is more prevalent in women, especially after menopause.

name: Urinary Tract Infections (UTIs)
description: UTIs are bacterial infections that affect any part of the urinary system, including the bladder, urethra, and kidneys. They are more common in women due to their shorter urethra.
